#text=Yesterday , I went to my local barber .
#text=I told him I wanted the buzz cut and he sat me down in the barber 's chair .
#text=He put a plastic sheet over my front so that I would n't get hair on my clothes .
#text=He then raised the chair to his preferred height .
#text=He combed out my hair to get it ready .
#text=He got his mechanical clippers and buzzed around my head .
#text=He was careful not to get hair in my eyes .
#text=I sat calmly as he made his way around my head and tried to move as little as possible so that he would not make any mistakes .
#text=After every few minutes , he asked what I thought about the progress .
#text=I gave him some additional input as to the type of style I wanted and he gladly obliged .
#text=Once my hair was cut , he gave me a mirror to check out the back of my head .
#text=He brushed away all remaining cut hair , took away the plastic sheet , lowered the chair , and I paid him .
